is this russian bluray again ? 

Everyone please seed or reseed this it says just 128 seed,(im never having a go at the uploader ! )  if you  find any file with low seeds & you still have the file please reseed (start sharing the file again from utorrent etc) torrent sites may not be around for ever so always help out. If you find a file lacking useful details like imdb.com  info or wikipedia info please copy & paste it into a comment to help every1 else out (eg if its porn what type eg lesbien) ive more than done my share of helping now its your turn, and always report viruses to the suprbay forum thanks ps dont forget the faster you seed uploading the faster your files download so set upload speed to unlimited in Utorrent etc ( copy and paste this comment & save it in a word document or open office or a draft email & then paste it as a reminder to people to be helpful on every torrent you look at â€Ś 1 by 1 teaching selfish snatch & grabbers to help out)

OMFG seriously? Am I going to have to look at that same f*#king post everywhere?
Seriously....?.... Seriously??
I'm sure anyone here knows, and understands, the basic idea behind a torrent site...we do not need your nagging posts on every torrent. it's the same as f*%king spam. Please give it a rest. A simple thanks and maybe a comment as to the quality is all that is needed. 
Either people are going to seed, or they aren't....you aggrevating everyone isn't going to change a thing.
